docs.summary:
The Roles API allows you to work with
 [member roles](https://support.wix.com/en/site-members/setting-your-members-permissions)
 from backend code.
description: Member roles help you manage which site members can access certain pages.
The Roles APIs allow you to manage the members assigned
as holders of each role from your site's backend code.
To use the Roles API, import `{roles}` from the `wix-users-backend` module:
```javascript
import {roles} from 'wix-users-backend';

params.name: roleId
params.doc: ID of the role to assign to the member.

params.name: memberId
params.doc: ID of the member to assign the role to.

params.name: options
params.doc: An object with the following boolean property: suppressAuth.

ret.doc:
Fulfilled - When the members are assigned to the role.
Rejected - Error message.

docs.summary:
**Deprecated.**
This function will continue to work, but a newer version is available at
[wix-members-backend.authorization.assignRole()](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-members-backend/authorization-obj/assignRole).
description: Assigns a role to a member.
> #### Migration Instructions
> If this function is already in your code, it will continue to work.
> To stay compatible with future changes, migrate to
> [`wix-members-backend.authorization.assignRole()`](wix-members-backend/authorization-obj/assignRole).
> To migrate to the new function:
> 1. Add the new import statement:
>    ```javascript
>    import { authorization } from 'wix-members-backend'
> 2. Remove the original `import { roles } from 'wix-users-backend'` statement.
> 3. Test your changes to make sure your code behaves as expected.
The `assignRole()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the
user with the given ID is assigned as holding the requested role.
The `roleId` parameter must be an ID from an existing role in your site.
The role ID can be copied from the Role Settings page.
You can reach the Role Settings page from your site's

[Member Permissions](https://www.wix.com/my-account/site-selector/?buttonText=Select%20Site&title=Select%20a%20Site&autoSelectOnSingleSite=true&actionUrl=https:%2F%2Fwww.wix.com%2Fdashboard%2F%7B%7BmetaSiteId%7D%7D%2Fmember-permissions%2Froles%3FreferralInfo%3Dvelo-docs)
page.
> **Note:** This function may take a few seconds until the role is assigned
> and the promise is resolved.

examples.title: Assign a member to a role
body: // NOTE: This example uses the new wix-members-backend.authorization.assignRole()
//       See the function description for more information, and
// NOTE: This example uses the deprecated

params.name: roleId
params.doc: ID of the role to remove from the member.

params.name: memberId
params.doc: ID of the member to remove the role from.

params.name: options
params.doc: An object with the following boolean property: suppressAuth.

ret.doc:
Fulfilled - When the members are removed from the role.
Rejected - Error message.

docs.summary:
**Deprecated.**
This function will continue to work, but a newer version is available at
[wix-members-backend.authorization.removeRole()](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-members-backend/authorization-obj/removeRole).
description: Removes a role from a member.
> #### Migration Instructions
> If this function is already in your code, it will continue to work.
> To stay compatible with future changes, migrate to
> [`wix-members-backend.authorization.removeRole()`](wix-members-backend/authorization-obj/removeRole).
> To migrate to the new function:
> 1. Add the new import statement:
>    ```javascript
>    import { authorization } from 'wix-members-backend'
> 2. Remove the original `import { roles } from 'wix-users-backend'` statement.
> 3. Test your changes to make sure your code behaves as expected.
The `removeRole()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the
user with the given ID is removed as a holder of the requested role.
The `roleId` parameter must be an ID from an existing role in your site.
The role ID can be copied from the Role Settings page.
You can reach the Role Settings page from your site's

[Member Permissions](https://www.wix.com/my-account/site-selector/?buttonText=Select%20Site&title=Select%20a%20Site&autoSelectOnSingleSite=true&actionUrl=https:%2F%2Fwww.wix.com%2Fdashboard%2F%7B%7BmetaSiteId%7D%7D%2Fmember-permissions%2Froles%3FreferralInfo%3Dvelo-docs)
page.
> **Note:** This function may take a few seconds until the role is assigned
> and the promise is resolved.

docs.summary: An object that you pass as the `options` parameter that modifies how an operation is performed.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: Prevents permission checks from running for the operation.
